TopicTitle: (Resolved) Launch Clamps not supplying ignitions at Cape Kanaveral Launch Sites

Articles.Content:
So I have Engine Ignitor and Cape Canaveral for 2.5x KSRSS installed, and some weirdness is happening which means that all launch clamps can't supply ignitions to engines with external ignitor specified seemingly only when using launch pads provided by Cape Kanaveral. This issue does not affect the stock launch pad.

Modlist (note that JNSQ is there just for the skybox)

000_TexturesUnlimited

Edited January 30, 2022 by KeaKaka

(apologies for necroposting)

I narrowed down the problem even more. It appears that if you use the Kerbal Konstructs editor even just once, external ignitions on all KK launchsites will break.
